parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|! This is our army, any apparition of {Orshabaal} will attack with all our resources.
A years ago one Orshabaal attacked our village, of course, we had to fight and after days of struggle we managed defeat the creature. He comes to trying to steal a {ancient rune}.
This stone is safe here in the village for hundreds of years, it protects us from any kind of threat, except from Orshabaal, one of the only monsters that ancient rune can not protect us.
